mapper.insert: insert into SC_SHOP_INFO ( SHOP_ID, SHOP_NAME, SHOP_TEL, SHOP_TYPE, SHOP_AREA, SHOP_ADDRESS, SHOP_VERSION ) values( #{UUID}, #{SHOPNAME}, #{PHONE}, #{SHOPTYPE}, #{SHOPAREA}, #{ADDRESS}, #{SIZE} )
mapper.select: select shopInfo.*,u1.USER_NAME,u1.USER_SN from (select ssi.*,sst.SERVICE_TYPE from sc_shop_info ssi INNER JOIN sc_service_type sst on ssi.SERVICETYPE_FK = sst.SERVICE_PK where ssi.SHOP_ID IN (SELECT us.FK_SHOP FROM sc_user_shop us where us.FK_USER_WX = #{USER_WX})) AS shopInfo INNER JOIN (select u.USER_NAME,u.USER_SN,sus.FK_SHOP from (SELECT su.USER_PK,su.USER_NAME,su.USER_SN from sc_user su inner join (select sur.FK_USER from sc_user_role sur where sur.FK_ROLE = (select ssr.ROLE_PK from sc_sys_role ssr where ssr.ROLE_NAME = '店长')) as userInfo on su.USER_PK = userInfo.FK_USER) as u INNER JOIN sc_user_shop sus on u.USER_PK = sus.FK_USER_WX) as u1 on shopInfo.SHOP_ID = u1.FK_SHOP;
